short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unite with Earth’s mightiest heroes with the Avengers Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring your favorite Avengers, this extension brings the excitement of the Marvel universe to your new tab. Quickly access your top websites with popular shortcuts, personalize your experience with custom links, and stay organized with the integrated calendar and clock. Effortlessly search the web using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Immerse yourself in the epic world of the Avengers.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Easily visit your favorite websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with frequently used links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay on top of your schedule with the built-in calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web quickly with your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall easily via the provided links.
